entry.definition: Number of different atomic species in the RMC configuration.

description.p: Number of different atomic species in the RMC configuration.

entry.definition: Labels for the different atoms types

description.p: Labels for the different atom types, with order consistent with the order of atoms in the configuration file.

entry.definition: Numbers of atoms of each type

description.p: Numbers of atoms of each type, in order of atoms in the configuration

entry.definition: Number of coordination restraints

description.p: Number of coordination restraints

entry.definition: Number of mean coordination restraints

description.p: Number of mean coordination restraints

entry.term: Number of neutron real-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of neutron real-space data sets

description.p: Number of neutron pair distrubution function data sets, whether G(r), D(r) or T(r)

entry.term: Number of neutron real-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of neutron real-space data sets

description.p: Number of neutron pair distrubution function data sets, whether G(r), D(r) or T(r)

entry.term: Number of neutron reciprocal-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of neutron reciprocal-space data sets

description.p: Number of neutron total scattering intensity data sets, whether S(Q), i(Q) or Qi(Q)

entry.term: Number of X-ray reciprocal-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of X-ray reciprocal-space data sets

description.p: Number of X-ray total scattering intensity data sets, whether S(Q), i(Q) or Qi(Q)

entry.definition: Bragg profile background coefficients

description.p: Coefficients used in Chebychev polynomial fitted to the Bragg profile background

entry.definition: Integers that define how the RMC configuration is a multiple replication of the crystal unit cell

description.p: Integers that define how the RMC configuration is a multiple replication of the crystal unit cell

entry.definition: Parameter that gives the relative weighting of the Bragg profile data to the overall value of chi-squared

description.p: Parameter that gives the relative weighting of the Bragg profile data to the overall value of chi-squared

entry.definition: Flag that determines whether or not to recalculate the hkl list

description.p: Flag that determines whether or not to recalculate the hkl list or to take it from the .amp file

entry.definition: Bragg profile type

description.p: Type of profile function to describe the shape of Bragg peaks in the Bragg profile data

entry.definition: Value of constant offset

description.p: Array of values of the constant offset to apply to scattering data

entry.definition: Flag to determine whether or not to apply a data offset

description.p: Array of flags that determine whether or not to apply offsets to the neutron scattering data

entry.definition: Flag to determine whether or not to renormalise data

description.p: Array of flags tha determine whether or not to apply data renormalisation

entry.definition: Matrix of lattice vectors

description.p: Matrix of lattice vectors that define the size and shape of the configuration, expressed in cartesian coordinates

entry.definition: Array of neighbour atom closest approach distances

description.p: Array of neighbour atom closest approach distances

entry.definition: Array of maximum atom move distances

description.p: Array of maximum atom move distances

entry.definition: Number of RMC steps between printing steps

description.p: Number of RMC steps between printing steps

entry.definition: Time limit for the job

description.p: Time limit for the job

entry.definition: Period of time between configuration saves

description.p: Period of time between configuration saves

entry.definition: Minimum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint

description.p: Array of minimum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint, one per atom pair

entry.definition: Maximum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint

description.p: Array of maximum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint, one per atom pair
